src:
Daftar Formasi CPNS 2019 untuk 67 Kementerian/Lembaga
04 Nov 2019, 06:31 by Siska Nirmala
JAKARTA, (PR).- Pemerintah membuka 152.250 formasi Calon Pegawai Negeri Sipil (CPNS) tahun 2019, yang terbagi untuk 67 kementerian/lembaga dan 461 pemerintah daerah, di mana pendaftarannya akan dimulai tanggal 11 November 2019.
Seperti dilansir Kantor Berita Antara, berdasarkan data yang diperoleh dari Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi, di Jakarta, Senin, 4 November 2019, 152.250 formasi CPNS itu dibagi masing-masing 37.425 formasi untuk kementerian/lembaga, dan 114.861 formasi untuk pemerintah daerah.
Deputi bidang SDM Aparatur Kementerian PANRB Setiawan Wangsaatmaja mengatakan jenis formasi yang dibuka tahun ini terdiri dari formasi umum dan formasi khusus.
"Formasi khusus itu antara lain untuk lulusan cumlaude, diaspora, putra dan putri asal Papua dan Papua Barat, penyandang disabilitas, dan formasi lain yang sifatnya strategis," kata Setiawan di Jakarta, Senin.
Dia mengatakan secara sektoral, pemerintah juga telah menetapkan jumlah formasi CPNS 2019.
Pada bidang pendidikan, formasi yang disiapkan sebanyak 65.397, pada bidang kesehatan sebanyak 34.038 formasi. Sedangkan untuk jabatan fungsional, disiapkan formasi sebanyak 31.912 dan pelaksana teknis dibuka 20.903 formasi.
Adapun untuk 67 kementerian/lembaga, berikut detail 37.425 formasi CPNS 2019:
1. Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Politik, Hukum dan Keamanan (60 formasi)2. Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Perekenomian (67)3. Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Pembangunan Manusia dan Kebudayaan (77)4. Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman (72)5. Kementerian Koperasi dan Usaha Kecil dan Menengah (98)6. Kementerian Badan Usaha Milik Negara (25)7. Kementerian Pemberdayaan Perempuan & Perlindungan anak (25)8. Kementerian Pendayagunaan Aparatur Negara dan Reformasi Birokrasi (140)9. Kementerian Pemuda dan Olahraga (11)10. Kementerian Desa, PDT, dan Transmigrasi (230)11. Kementerian Dalam Negeri (370)12. Kementerian Luar Negeri (138)13. Kementerian Pertahanan (552)14. Kementerian Hukum Dan Ham (4.598)15. Kementerian Keuangan (202)16. Kementerian Pertanian (520)17. Kementerian Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral (187)18. Kementerian Perhubungan (1.244)19. Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan (plus formasi Dikti) (2.196)20. Kementerian Kesehatan (2.205)21. Kementerian Agama (5.815)22. Kementerian Tenaga Kerja (416)23. Kementerian Sosial (117)24. Kementerian Lingkungan Hidup dan Kehutanan (705)25. Kementerian Kelautan dan Perikanan (399)26. Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika (581)27. Kementerian Perdagangan (222)28. Kementerian Perindustrian (359)29. Kementerian Pekerjaan Umum dan Perumahan Rakyat (1.180)30. Kementerian Pariwisata (202)31. Kementerian Riset dan Teknologi (11)32. Kementerian Sekretariat Negara/ Sekretariat Kabinet (90)33. Kejaksaan Agung RI (5.203)34. Badan Inteljen Negara (721)35. Sekretariat Jenderal MPR (21)36. Sekretariat Jendral DPR (59)37. Sekretariat Mahkamah Agung (2.104)38. Sekretariat Jendral BPK (348)39. Badan Kepegawaian Negara (180)40. Lembaga Penerbangan Antariksa Nasional (131)41. Lembaga Ilmu Pengetahuan Indonesia (170)42. Badan Tenaga Nuklir Nasional (156)43. Kementerian Perencanaan Pembangunan Nasional/BAPPENAS ( 209)44. Arsip Nasional RI (71)45. Badan Informasi Geospasial (48)46. Badan Kependudukan dan Keluarga Berencana Nasional (282)47. Badan Koordinasi Penanaman Modal (19)48. Badan Pengkajian dan Penerapan Teknologi (300)49. Badan Pengawasan Keuangan dan Pembangunan (160)50. Kementerian Agraria dan Tata Ruang (727)51. Perpustakaan Nasional (57)52. Badan Pengawas Tenaga Nuklir (41)53. Badan Pengawasan Obat dan Makanan (277)54. Lembaga Ketahanan Nasional (42)55. Kepolisian Negara RI (554)56. Badan Narkotika Nasional (154)57. Sekretariat Komisi Pemilihan Umum (716)58. Badan Nasional Penanggulangan Bencana (93)59. Sekretariat Komisi Nasional HAM (15)60. Badan Nasional Penempatan dan Perlindungan TKI (143)61. Badan Keamanan Laut (171)62. Badan SAR Nasional (391)63. Lembaga Kebijakan Pengadaan Barang/Jasa Pemerintah (139)64. Komisi Ombusman (91)65. Badan Nasional Penanggulangan Teroris (139)66. Badan Pengawas Pemilu (319)67. Badan Pembina Ideologi Pancasila (60).***

text:
List of CPNS 2019 Formations for 67 Ministries / Institutions
Nov 04 2019, 06:31 by Siska Nirmala
JAKARTA, (PR) .- The government opened 152,250 formation of 2019 Civil Servant Candidates (CPNS), which is divided into 67 ministries / agencies and 461 local governments, where registration will begin on 11 November 2019.
As reported by Antara News Agency, based on data obtained from the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform, in Jakarta, Monday, November 4, 2019, 152,250 CPNS formations were divided respectively 37,425 formations for ministries / institutions, and 114,861 formations for local governments.
Deputy of the HR Department of the Apparatus of the PANRB Ministry Setiawan Wangsaatmaja said the type of formation that was opened this year consisted of general formations and special formations.
"Special formations include cum laude graduates, diaspora, sons and daughters from Papua and West Papua, persons with disabilities, and other strategic formations," Setiawan said in Jakarta on Monday.
He said by sector, the government had also set the number of 2019 CPNS formations.
In the field of education, the formation prepared was 65,397, in the health sector were 34,038 formations. Whereas for functional positions, a total of 31,912 formations were prepared and 20,903 technical practitioners were opened.
As for 67 ministries / institutions, here are the details of 37,425 CPNS formations in 2019:
1. Coordinating Ministry for Politics, Law and Security (60 formations) 2. Coordinating Ministry for Economic Affairs (67) 3. The Coordinating Ministry for Human Development and Culture (77) 4. Coordinating Ministry for Maritime Affairs (72) 5. Ministry of Cooperatives and Small and Medium Enterprises (98) 6. Ministry of State Owned Enterprises (25) 7. Ministry of Women's Empowerment & Child Protection (25) 8. Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (140) 9. Ministry of Youth and Sports (11) 10. Ministry of Villages, PDT, and Transmigration (230) 11. Ministry of Home Affairs (370) 12. Ministry of Foreign Affairs (138) 13. Ministry of Defense (552) 14. Ministry of Law and Human Rights (4,598) 15. Ministry of Finance (202) 16. Ministry of Agriculture (520) 17. Ministry of Energy and Mineral Resources (187) 18. Ministry of Transportation (1,244) 19. Ministry of Education and Culture (plus formation of Dikti) (2,196) 20. Ministry of Health (2,205) 21. Ministry of Religion (5,815) 22. Ministry of Manpower (416) 23. Ministry of Social Affairs (117) 24. Ministry of Environment and Forestry (705) 25. Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (399) 26. Ministry of Communication and Information (581) 27. Ministry of Trade (222) 28. Ministry of Industry (359) 29. Ministry of Public Works and Public Housing (1,180) 30. Ministry of Tourism (202) 31. Ministry of Research and Technology (11) 32. Ministry of State Secretariat / Cabinet Secretariat (90) 33. Republic of Indonesia Attorney General Office (5,203) 34. State Intelligence Agency (721) 35. MPR Secretariat General (21) 36. DPR Secretariat General (59) 37. Supreme Court Secretariat (2,104) 38. BPK Secretariat General (348) 39. State Personnel Agency (180) 40. National Institute of Space Aviation (131) 41. Indonesian Institute of Sciences (170) 42. National Nuclear Energy Agency (156) 43. Ministry of National Development Planning / BAPPENAS (209) 44. Republic of Indonesia National Archives (71) 45. Geospatial Information Agency (48) 46. National Population and Family Planning Agency (282) 47. Investment Coordinating Board (19) 48. Technology Assessment and Application Board (300) 49. Financial and Development Supervisory Agency (160) 50. Ministry of Agrarian Affairs and Spatial Planning (727) 51. National Library (57) 52. Nuclear Energy Regulatory Agency (41) 53. Drug and Food Control Agency (277) 54. National Resilience Institute (42) 55. RI National Police (554) 56. National Narcotics Agency (154) 57. General Election Commission Secretariat (716) 58. National Disaster Management Agency (93) 59. Secretariat of the National Human Rights Commission (15) 60. National Agency for the Placement and Protection of Migrant Workers (143) 61. Marine Security Agency (171) 62. National SAR Agency (391) 63. Government Goods / Services Procurement Policy Agency (139) 64. Ombusman Commission (91) 65. National Counterterrorism Agency (139) 66. Election Oversight Body (319) 67. Pancasila Ideology Board of Trustees (60). ***
